    • moveMotherNature

      public boolean moveMotherNature(int steps, Player player)
      Check if is possible to move motherNature of specified steps
      Parameters:
      steps - that the player wants motherNature to do
      player - going to perform the action
      Returns:
      true and perform the movement, false if not possible

    • pickFromCloud

      public boolean pickFromCloud(Player player, int cloud)
      Pick pawns from the chosen cloud and put it in player's entrance
      Parameters:
      player - the player who chose
      cloud - the chosen cloud
      Returns:
      true if adding to the entrance is ok, otherwise false
